title: How to Connect Jambox to iPhone

steps.title: Plug your Jambox speaker into the wall.
steps.content: Plug your Jambox speaker into the wall. It comes with a charger cord that fits into a 2-prong wall outlet.

steps.title: Opt to connect your Jambox directly to your computer to charge it.
steps.content: Opt to connect your Jambox directly to your computer to charge it. You can plug a micro USB cord into your Jambox. Connect the other end to your USB port. Make sure you are not connecting the micro USB cord to a keyboard. It will not charge if connected to a computer accessory other than a USB hub.

steps.title: Wait for the LED ring light on the side of the Jambox to flash a white light.
steps.content: Wait for the LED ring light on the side of the Jambox to flash a white light. It will flash a red light until it is charged. It takes about 2.5 hours to fully charge a Jambox.

steps.title: Disconnect the charger cord when charging is complete.
steps.content: Disconnect the charger cord when charging is complete.

steps.title: Hold the power switch on the side of the Jambox in the up position for 3 seconds.
steps.content: Hold the power switch on the side of the Jambox in the up position for 3 seconds.

steps.title: Listen for an audio message from the Jambox that informs you it is in pairing mode.
steps.content: Listen for an audio message from the Jambox that informs you it is in pairing mode. The LED ring light should flash red and white.

steps.title: Lower the Power button to the middle position.
steps.content: Lower the Power button to the middle position. There is a top, middle and down position.

steps.title: Bring your iPhone within 33 feet (10.1 m) (11 yards) of your Jambox.
steps.content: Bring your iPhone within 33 feet (10.1 m) (11 yards) of your Jambox. It will be able to pair via Bluetooth at this distance or less.

steps.title: Turn on the iPhone.
steps.content: Turn on the iPhone. Go to your Home screen. Select the Setting app.

steps.title: Look for the word “Bluetooth” near the top of your Settings list.
steps.content: Look for the word “Bluetooth” near the top of your Settings list. Tap on it.

steps.title: Slide the Bluetooth radio button into the on position, if it is turned off.
steps.content: Slide the Bluetooth radio button into the on position, if it is turned off. Wait a few seconds for it to search for devices.

steps.title: Look for “Jambox by Jawbone” in the list of available devices.
steps.content: Look for “Jambox by Jawbone” in the list of available devices. Tap on it.

steps.title: Enter the general passcode of “0000.
steps.content: Enter the general passcode of “0000. ” Your Jambox and iPhone should be connected.
